name: FNF: Arcade Showdown for Mobile
description:
bruh mobile controls ain't working i hate you!!

You have to enter a song first before going into options. It's a bug that'll be fixed in the future.

Nyaw!

- Boyfriend, during Nyaw

Did you know this was coming? Nope.

All songs are in order. Flatzone is not included due to copyright.

CREDITS

  • Subscribe to PaperKitty here! - https://www.youtube.com/c/PaperKittyYT. Download FNF: Arcade Showdown at https://gamebanana.com/mods/44683!
  • Donate to the Friday Night Funkin' team at https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin!
  • Rest of the credits are located in the game.
